definition: a piece of furniture having a smooth flat top that is usually supported by one or more vertical legs, arrange or enter in tabular form
details:
noun
- a piece of furniture having a smooth flat top that is usually supported by one or more vertical legs
= example: a piece of furniture having a smooth flat top that is usually supported by one or more vertical legs
- a piece of furniture with tableware for a meal laid out on it
= example: a piece of furniture with tableware for a meal laid out on it
- food or meals in general
= example: food or meals in general
= synonyms: board
- a set of data arranged in rows and columns
= example: a set of data arranged in rows and columns
= synonyms: tabular array
- a company of people assembled at a table for a meal or game
= example: a company of people assembled at a table for a meal or game
- flat tableland with steep edges
= synonyms: mesa
verb
- arrange or enter in tabular form
= synonyms: tabulate, tabularize, tabularise
- hold back to a later time
= synonyms: remit
